original_text: When Belshazzar heard that, he caused his servants to put purple clothes on Daniel. They put a gold chain round his neck to show that he was an important person. The king told everyone that Daniel had become the third ruler in the kingdom.
korean_text: 이에 벨사살이 명하여 그들이 다니엘에게 자주색 옷을 입히게 하며 금 사슬을 그의 목에 걸어 주고 그를 위하여 조서를 내려 나라의 셋째 통치자로 삼으니라

sentences.original_text: he caused his servants to put purple clothes on Daniel
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 종들에게 다니엘에게 보라색 옷을 입게 하였다

sentences.original_text: They put a gold chain round his neck
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 목에 금 사슬을 두르었다

sentences.original_text: to show that he was an important person
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 중요한 사람이라는 것을 나타내기 위해서

sentences.original_text: that Daniel had become the third ruler in the kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 다니엘이 나라의 세 번째 통치자가 되었다는 것을
